title: 求要梦世界的那一种UHC极限生存插件
author: xing_heng_

replies.author: jiand_jun~~~
replies.txt_content:
你好，这款插件是收费的。名字叫Ultra HardCore Reloaded
https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/?ultra-hardcore-reloaded?-advanced-scoreboard-teams-world-gen-anti-lag-chunks.2900/

(所以我会告诉你我7月份开发某曙光uhc就用的这款插件吗)

replies.author: jiand_jun~~~
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: Black_White_
replies.txt_content: 这插件要RMB购买，去官网https://www.spigotmc.org/就算我有也不卖，40金粒怎么够
